caseStudies.title: From 3 Hours to 5 Minutes: Quote Automation
caseStudies.challenge: Sales team spending 40% of time on manual quote generation
caseStudies.solution: Custom AI system connected to CRM, ERP, and product database
caseStudies.testimonial: What used to take our team 3 hours now takes 5 minutes. The accuracy is remarkable.
caseStudies.content:
The Challenge

A professional services firm in Singapore was struggling with their quoting process. Their sales team spent nearly 40% of their time pulling together quotes — gathering product specs, checking pricing rules, accounting for customer history, and ensuring compliance.

The information existed across multiple systems — their CRM, ERP, product database, and pricing spreadsheets. But piecing it together was manual, tedious, and error-prone.

The Solution

We built a custom AI system that:

  • Connects to all their data sources in real-time
  • Understands their specific products and pricing logic
  • Generates accurate quotes based on customer requirements
  • Flags anything unusual for human review

The key wasn't replacing human judgment — it was eliminating the manual data gathering and calculation that consumed most of the time.

The Results

Within 4 weeks of deployment:

  • Quote generation time: Reduced from 3 hours to 5 minutes
  • Error rate: Down 90%
  • Sales team capacity: Up 35% — now focused on selling, not admin

Key Takeaway

AI isn't about replacing people. It's about eliminating the tedious work so people can focus on what actually requires human intelligence: building relationships, solving complex problems, closing deals.

caseStudies.title: Automating Document Processing for Carbon Trading
caseStudies.challenge: Manual processing of carbon credit documentation taking days
caseStudies.solution: AI-powered document extraction and validation system
caseStudies.testimonial: We can now process in minutes what used to take our team days. The accuracy is better than manual review.
caseStudies.content:
The Challenge

A carbon credit marketplace needed to process hundreds of documents daily — verification reports, certification documents, and compliance paperwork. Each document required careful extraction of key data points and validation against multiple criteria.

Their team was spending days on document processing, creating a bottleneck that slowed down trading operations.

The Solution

We developed an AI system that:

  • Extracts key information from PDFs automatically
  • Validates data against compliance requirements
  • Flags discrepancies for human review
  • Integrates directly with their trading platform

The Results

  • Processing time: Reduced from days to minutes
  • Accuracy: 99.2% — higher than manual processing
  • Capacity: Can now handle 10x the document volume
